author: Daniel S
comment: couldn't figure out how to show unread notifications..  plus was not good for OLED burn in..   LG Urbane AW 2.0

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Use  yeah in text line :-) of you use only one watch face all the time you can get burn-in on every single watch face because some pixels in some areas are just more frequently used... Just change watch face from time to time and you are safe :-)

author: Phil Auter
comment: This is an excellent watch face (especially in ambient / dim mode).  On my Huawei smart watch it did everything as advertised.  (I currently have the countdown clock set to vacation start date!).  Only challenge I had was with weather updating.  However, I emailed the designer and he got back to me within a few hours with suggests. Now it works 100%.  Great watchface and great designer!

author: Major Rager
comment: Great looking watch face with good options. It's definitely one of the best looking watch faces out there, however the countdown timer is a bit useless to me & I wish there were more options for what the center button does. It'd also be nice to be able to change the dim mode's colours. As some others have mentioned, I wish I could change the dimming time as well. Great watch face all around.  (My watch is a Nixon Mission SmartWatch).
title: Nicely done!

author: Dennis Zucker
comment: First : I can't believe anyone could rate this less than 4 stars!!  Amazing product, great options and customizable.  Second : Thank you for keeping it simple.  I'm no tech genius and I pretty much have this set up the way I like it.  If only there was some sort of super shortcut to a stop watch function I'd be in heaven!!
title: Wow, just wow!

author: Alex Piggott
comment: Good and original idea for a watchface, quite well executed - I like the style. Only problem is that the central ring is 1) I find visually unappealing (obv subjective!) but also 2) bit worried about using it on an AMOLED screen 'cos burn in. If there was an option to replace the ring with a 1-2 pixel colored circle (keep glow etc) then it would be a great everyday watch face and would be well worth a $ or so. Or if the ring had a separate dim brightness option I suppose so I could  set it down to like 10%

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Hi Alex. Thanks  for the suggestions, I'll try to use them in the next update :-)

title: Generally nice, bit worried about ring

author: Jason Nowland
comment: I often grew frustrated after downloading a watch face app, only to find it extremely simplistic unless I paid for the premium. This app is customizable in the free mode as if it were premium.
title: Best watch face yet

author: Attila Repassy
comment: This is my favourite, very cool, even in DIM mode (which is quite rare). Never hangs, and not at all battery consuming. One thing: I would love to be able to set the seconds before DIM. Otherwise perfect for me. Grats, developers!

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you very much, the next update may bring some new options, I will try to add the screen-off time :-)

title: Best so far

author: Todd Billingsley
comment: Thank you this is a very nice Android wear watch face. Loving it in always on/power save mode too as many of them look bad during this phase.
title: Nice modern watch face!

author: nsoromma8
comment: This app has a lot of options for free. I have purchased other watch items from this maker and have been very happy so I decided to try this free option. It looks great on my Sw3 no issues found at all. I'm very happy to have found another face that looks great on a square layout. This is the best free stand alone face I have used. This developer far as I have found really cares about their product. Well done

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you :-)

author: Michael Julien
comment: Looks great! Especially in Dim mode. Weather and phone battery doesn't update on Huawei P9 though... also can't see ok google button anywhere. Will rate 5 stars if fixed. How about including a step count shortcut too?

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Michael - please excluded the app from battery savings, you phone disables crucial app functions.

author: Steven P
comment: I really enjoy this watch face. The only thing that I would like to see added, is an option to keep the screen display on longer, for a variety of seconds.
title: Nice watch face

author: Plymouth Freebo
comment: Using commands like  and  keep track of your battery power level of smart watch and Mobile battery is cool and convenient this is the best face watch I've seen so far awesome editor and commands awesome 10/10 please give us more commands and more editing features of the smart watch and customisable mobile too thumbs up greatest app

author: Janesh Mishra
comment: The watch face delivers perfectly on the description. Finally something that I liked, and can play around with to make slight modifications that result in amazing watch faces. Works great on the Asus Zenwatch 2
title: An amazing customizable watch face

author: Adam Sawyer
comment: This is my favorite watch face.  The dim mode is identical to the regular mode and is still easy on battery.  Looks amazing!  Has phone/watch battery levels, weather, and an integrated countdown timer.  Thank you for this, great job.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Adam for the great review :-)

title: Amazing on Moto 360

comment: I do like it. couldn't find watch face for a long time and this one with all options is just great. would be fantastic if there is a option to save few settings to easily come back to them

author: Dalia Gonzalez
comment: Love the look of this watch face.  It's my default face because it's so easy to customize and has all the info I need on a daily basis and looks cool at the same time.
title: simple and fashionable

author: James Sawyer
comment: One of very few watch faces that actually looks cool and has really good custom settings. Really good effort. 8/10. That 2 higher than any other face.
title: Great

author: Jeroen Smits
comment: Tried several watchfaces that claim to have count down timer. But this is the first that delivers. Than I found all the customization options. This is a keeper.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Jeroen  :-)

title: Finally a good count down watchface

author: Stephen Brown
comment: I can't work out how to do this ...  COUNTDOWN OPTION  allowing you to count days, hours, minutes - set date, set time, define text - activate discreet vibrations to let you know that the time is over
title: How?

author: Darren Hubbard
comment: Sorry if I'm being dumb I can't see where to set the settings in the Wear app on the phone... watch faces haven't shown up in the app for quite a few updates of that app now..?

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Well, Darren ... you need to learn a lot About Android Wear :-) Here is my FAQ: http://bit.ly/wearfaq - I suppose that your devices needs an update to fix issues you are experiencing, if you need personalized support, mail me please.

title: Settings?

comment: Ok I finally get the idea this is more like appointment rather then a timer. Is there a way to get the native timer setting and display?

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content:
This is custom countown :-) System timer has own interface :-)
I am working on Calendar integration rather than native timer, that would be a little bit pointless don't you think?
Let's see in the future.

author: Bradley Yensan
comment: I love how customizable it is, and how beautiful it looks! I wish there was an option to disable the background in normal mode. For some reason it is able to be disabled in dim mode but not normal. Still, I think this is fantastic watch face!
title: Gorgeous glowing watch face

author: Spike Holden
comment: phone battery still doesnt update and countdown broken on sw3. Removed a further star. Edit: i have no personal settings all stock. Other faces update fine. Your coding!

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Dear Spike. Nobody from testers reported problems like yours. Conclusion: your example is separated and based on personal settings. EDIT: the app has over 50.000 users, there are no problems like yours described in all the reviews. If the app doesn't fit your needs I can't force to use it. Thank you anyway. In the future more updates are coming.

title: Bugs

author: Terry. B.
comment: A Favorite of mine. Of Course I change my watchface regularly but This one is Always one of my top faces. Again, very nicely done!

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Terry!

title: Very Nice Watchface

comment: Can't even purchase the Minimal and Elegant absolute failure

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: It's a failure of Play Store on your mobile device, it's not an app fault. You can mail me (academyextreme@gmail.com) or Google customer support for the help.

author: Gurpreet Singh Sachdeva
comment: Very good if there would have been % option in battery to display watch battery in % I would have given 5 stars . So please add this.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Hello. Please put BAT and BATP tags into top and bottom line and you will get battery in percentage. Remember to open tag with sharp quite and close it too. In app there is button CUSTOM TAGS INFO - please check it - you can add a lot of info in those 4 lines :-)

title: Very Good just add % option in battery

author: Emmanuel Perez
comment: Just the configuration options alone make this watch incredible, but it has a good looking face too 5 stars way up

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you very much! :-)

title: Wow

author: Esco Escobar
comment: Unfortunate

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: It works. See Android Wear application for settings entry. It's standard Android Wear solution. If you need more help mail me.

title: Doesn't work on my note 4?

author: Carmelo Fontanez
comment: Best watch face hands down. Absolutely gorgeous, my favorite watch face. Wish it had battery percentages instead of lines. Everything else is just perfect.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content:
Hi, you can use text lines and TAGs to display BAT - watch battery and BATP - phone battery :-) if you need more help - let me know via mail :-)
Thanks!

author: Marco Mendoza
comment: Needs a way to easily tap on the watch screen to change color
title: Tap for color

author: Chris Mooty
comment: Works efficiently. Display is clear. And doesn't mess with other functions. Its great.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Chris :-)

title: Love it

author: Chavie Boots
comment: I like theme fact that I can customize the color schemes. It looks gorgeous. 🙌
title: Very, very nice!

author: Tony Nuñez
comment: great digital watch face, and keeps getting better with each update. Thx!
title: Best free one available!

author: Kimmo Niinimäki
comment: This one is my daily driver. It is battery friendly and has a nice customizable futuristic look.
title: One of the nicest

author: Jase Maddox
comment: Nice face though, even though watch is set for always on the face goes black sometimes.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Your watch can go black due to system settings rather not from app itself. Android Wear tries to save your battery in some cases of inactivity...

author: Bong Cha
comment: Simple, free and customized. Very cool. Thanks. Keep up the good work.

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you very much! :-)

title: One of the best customize watch face

author: Nur Anuar Mohamed
comment: Just awesome!
title: My Top Android Wear Watchface

author: Dave Campbell
comment: Would not communicate

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content:
This is application for Android Wear Devices. Free app, it took many days of work to create it, then you get such reviews... Communicate? With what!?
Dave - do you think it's easy and nice to read such unfair reviews?

title: HORRIBLE

author: Massoud Qafouri
comment: If you own sony smartwatch 3 this is the easiest watch face you need to create your own watch face.
title: Sony smartwatch 3

author: Gregory Tomczak
comment: I had many different face watches but this one is simply the best

reply.author: Studio eXtreme
reply.content: Thank you Gregory :-)

title: Really cool!
